  • Method Details

    • rated

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams rated(boolean rated)

    • rated

      default ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams rated()

    • variant

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams variant(Enums.VariantName variant)

    • variant

      default ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams variant(Function<Enums.VariantName.Provider, Enums.VariantName> variant)

    • fen

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams fen(String fen)
      Parameters:
      fen - Custom initial position (in FEN). Default: "rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 0 1" Variant must be standard, fromPosition, or chess960 (if a valid 960 starting positiion), and the game cannot be rated. Castling moves will use UCI_Chess960 notation, for example e1h1 instead of e1g1.

    • name

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams name(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - Optional name for the challenge, that players will see on the challenge page.

    • users

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams users(String white, String black)
      Optionally specify two usernames. Only these users may join the challenge.
      Parameters:
      white - the username which plays white pieces
      black - the username which plays black pieces

    • noAbort

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams noAbort()

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams noRematch()

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams noGiveTime()

    • noEarlyDraw

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams noEarlyDraw()

    • expiresIn

      ChallengesApi.OpenEndedParams expiresIn(Duration expiresIn)
      Defaults to 24h after creation. Can't be more than 2 weeks after creation.
